page.title: 08A Visit to the Wood Yard
page.content: On 21st June 1985, we went to the wood yard. When we arrived, the {manager}showed us round. He said all the workers had to wear ear muffs otherwise they would become{deaf. He showed us the wood they use to make doors and we saw loads of sawdust! We came to a door where he said we could not go in as we were under age and it would make us deaf. He showed us an{extractor}on the roof and another on the ground, these take away some of the dust. They use{mahogany}and{English oak}and mainly make doors. A man brought out a box of bits of wood and we each took some for ourselves and some for the rest of the class. We said goodbye and thank you and when we got back to school, we gave everyone a piece of wood.
